meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Once upon a time, our ancestors told their descendants ...
#c 從前，祖先告訴他們的子女，

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e In our flatland in the mountain,
#c 我們山上的地，

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e There came a man who told the people to build a boat.
#c 有一個人來跟大家說，要造一艘船。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The people did not listen to him.
#c 大家都不聽他的話。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e He went around and told each family to build a boat.
#c 他走到各家，吩咐他們要造船。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Nobody paid attention to him.
#c 沒有人聽他的話。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e He said that if they didn't believe, their land will sink.
#c 他們若不相信，他們的地都會沈下去。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Everybody did not believe him, except for one family.
#c 除了一個家庭之外，沒有人相信他。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The gods will protect those who believe.
#c 神會保護相信他的人。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e After the dirty person, who is a god, convinced the family, they believed and started to build a boat.
#c 有一家人聽完那人的話，就相信他，開始造船。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The boat was wide and big.
#c 船寬又大。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e It took a long time to build the boat.
#c 造船需要很長的時間。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Finally, the boat was completed.
#c 船做完以後，

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e And the god came to see it.
#c 神就來看看。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e And said, your boat has been finished.
#c 他說，你們的船造好了。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e If it has been finished,
#c 如果做好了，

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The god, the man with dirty appearance, (called and) kept the animals inside.
#c 外表骯髒的神就把所有的動物叫進船裡。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e All the animals came.
#c 所有的動物都來了。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e His boat was finished.
#c 他的船造好了。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e They were assigned spaces.
#c 分配了位子給他們。

free: #e They were called and kept in a room.

free: #e There was room for putting the rice and water, as well as for the animals and the family members.
#c 有地方放米，有地方放水，有地方放狗，每個人都有各自的地方。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The animals were brought first into the boat. The people entered last.
#c 動物先帶進船內；人最後進去。

free: #e They entered inside.
#c 他們進去裡面。

free: #e The dirty man said to them,
#c 骯髒的人告訴他們說，

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Close it like this inside.
#c 裡面要這樣鎖住。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e I will lock you inside from outside; you will be inside.
#c 我要從外面把門反鎖；你們都在裡面。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e If somebody comes, do not open it.

free: #e Don't open it.

風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Neighbors in the village came and called.

風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Open your boat; let us get in.

free: #e Those inside called out.

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e There's no way we can open it.

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e There's no way.

free: #e Where is a door that can be opened?

free: #e The people outside were all flooded away.
